help-file.title: MOONSTONE
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <target> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Permanent until the caster rents Type of spell: Teleportation
"Moonstone" allows a Druid to use moonwell without needing another player for a target. The druid selects a spot to bind a moonstone to, which will serve as an anchor for the moonwell.
